alert.note: Alert for Atchison; Doniphan (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued February 22 at 10:04AM CST until February 23 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON CST WEDNESDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, a mix of light snow and freezing drizzle. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 15 below zero. * WHERE...Portions of northeast Kansas and northwest Missouri. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to noon CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Slippery sidewalks, roads and bridges are possible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
